Container.Name: FlexGet
Container.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] FlexGet is a command line tool for downloading just about anything via a YAML file[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where FlexGet will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/output[/b] Output folder[br]
